name: Firefight (itch) (PKerfant)
description:
Firefight is an endless game where you play as a cowboy, and fight off against waves of enemies. Survive for as long as you can !

Features:

  • An endless amount of random waves of enemies, which progressively get bigger and stronger !
  • Collect gold to buy more powerful weapons and upgrades to your health, speed and reload speed !
  • A wide variety of enemies : from basic melee oriented miners to shamans who shield other enemies with their magic, all enemies are bent on making your life harder (and much, much shorter) !
  • Break crates to find helpful pickups, which can heal you, temporarily provide infinite ammo or summon reinforcements.

Controls :

  • WASD to move around
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left-click to shoot
  • R to reload (automaticly reload when shooting and your weapon is out of ammo)

Credits:

  • Programming and art assets by me
  • Sounds are from Freesound.org (see relevant credit section in game)
  • Music by Azakaela on Itch.io
  • Made with Unity

The game was made in early 2022.
